Ann_Arbor.Escher Cooperative House:
Escher Cooperative House, named after artist M. C. Escher, is one of the ICC's 19 student housing cooperatives. It is located at 1500 to 1520 Gilbert Court in Ann Arbor, Michigan.


== History ==


=== HUD loan ===
During the 1950s, the University of Michigan responded to post-war growth by developing North Campus, ensuring future demand for nearby student housing.
